Public Interface IAzureUtilizationCollection Implements IPartnerComponent(Of Tuple(Of String, String))

Docs.summary: Groups behavior related to Azure subscription utilization records.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.ResourceCollection<Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationRecord> Query (DateTimeOffset startTime, DateTimeOffset endTime, Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationGranularity granularity = Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationGranularity.Daily, bool showDetails = true, Nullable<int> size = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.ResourceCollection`1<class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationRecord> Query(valuetype System.DateTimeOffset startTime, valuetype System.DateTimeOffset endTime, valuetype Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationGranularity granularity, bool showDetails, valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> size) cil managed

Public Function Query (startTime As DateTimeOffset, endTime As DateTimeOffset, Optional granularity As AzureUtilizationGranularity = Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationGranularity.Daily, Optional showDetails As Boolean = true, Optional size As Nullable(Of Integer) = null) As ResourceCollection(Of AzureUtilizationRecord)

Docs.param: The starting time of when the utilization was metered in the billing system.
The ending time of when the utilization was metered in the billing system.
The resource usage time granularity. Can either be daily or hourly. Default is daily.
If set to true, the utilization records will be split by the resource instance levels. If set to false, the utilization records will be aggregated on the resource level. Default is true.
An optional maximum number of records to return. The returned resource collection will specify a next link in case there were more utilization records available.
Docs.summary: Retrieves utilization records for the Azure subscription.
Docs.returns: The Azure resource utilization for the subscription.

Public Function QueryAsync (startTime As DateTimeOffset, endTime As DateTimeOffset, Optional granularity As AzureUtilizationGranularity = Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationGranularity.Daily, Optional showDetails As Boolean = true, Optional size As Nullable(Of Integer) = null) As Task(Of ResourceCollection(Of AzureUtilizationRecord))

Docs.param: The starting time of when the utilization was metered in the billing system.
The ending time of when the utilization was metered in the billing system.
The resource usage time granularity. Can either be daily or hourly. Default is daily.
If set to true, the utilization records will be split by the resource instance levels. If set to false, the utilization records will be aggregated on the resource level. Default is true.
An optional maximum number of records to return. The returned resource collection will specify a next link in case there were more utilization records available.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously retrieves utilization records for the Azure subscription.
Docs.returns: A task that returns the Azure resource utilization for the subscription.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.ResourceCollection`1<class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Utilizations.AzureUtilizationRecord> Seek(string continuationToken, valuetype Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Query.SeekOperation seekOperation) cil managed

Docs.param: The continuation token from the previous results.
The seek operation to perform. Next is only supported.
Docs.summary: Seeks pages of of utilization for resources that belong to an Azure subscription owned by a customer of the partner.
